title: Fragment, 10th century
medium:
Medium: silk and gold thread embroidery on cotton ground
Technique: split-stitched embroidery
description: Fragmented and incomplete depiction of two lions in profile view, in light green, light blue, cream, brown, and gold.

Fragment, 10th century.
10th century. Medium: silk and gold thread embroidery on cotton ground
